content.rendered:
Directed by Gautham Vasudev Menon. Lee Whittaker

Written by Jayamohan

Cast Silambarasan Rajendar (Muthuveeran (as T.R. Silambarasan)). Siddhi Idnani (Paavai). Radhika Sarathkumar (Latchumi). Appukutty (Saravanan). Bava Chelladurai (Sermadurai). Pathman (Maasanam). Aangelina Abraham (Gomathi). Pankaj Anand (Builder). Neeraj Madhav (Sreedharan). Siddique (Kutty Bhai). Adithya Bhaskar (Adhi). Delhi Ganesh (Iyer). Geetha Kailasam (Selvi). Ajmina Kassim (Mahalakshmi). Kavithalaya Krishnan (Ganesh Iyer). Mak Manigandan (Arunjunai). Richard James Peter (Esakki). Phathmen (Maasanam). Jaisinth S.S.(Arunachalam). Jaffer Sadiq (Rawther). Sara (Karjee). Sathya (Senthooran). Deepak Dutt Sharma (Samir Bhai). Shivamani (Rauf Bhai). Tulasi (Durga)

Languages Tamil

Producers Ishari K. Ganeshan. Eiqbal Jaafri. Zafar Khan

Production Vels Film International
